elements.name: panel1
elements.title: You apply for a job as a paramedic and are asked whether you have chronic back problems.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The question is closely related to the work to be performed. A paramedic must be able to carry, position and transport people under time pressure. This is not possible with chronic back problems.

elements.name: panel6
elements.title: You apply for a job as a bricklayer and are asked whether you belong to a trade union.

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The question is not directly related to the work to be performed. Union membership is a right to which all employees are entitled.

elements.name: question13
elements.title: Answer:
elements.correctAnswer: No, I haven't thought about that yet.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: You apply for a job as an electrician and are asked whether you are colorblind.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The question is closely related to the work to be done. Anyone who is unable to distinguish colors from plans/lines without any doubt is endangering themselves and others in this profession or can cause major damage.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: You apply for a job as an educator and are asked whether you have ever experienced burnout.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The question is not directly related to the work to be done, because burnout is any illness that can affect almost anyone.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Answer:
elements.correctAnswer: No, I've never been off work for any length of time.

elements.name: panel4
elements.title: You apply for a job as a care specialist and are asked how you see yourself politically.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The question is not related to the work to be performed.

elements.name: question14
elements.title: Answer:
elements.correctAnswer: It depends on the topic, but I generally find myself in the middle.
